Html:
When scrolling the mouse wheel over the chart, the chart zooms in both the X and Y axes. Is it possible to limit zooming to just the X-axis? If so, how can I achieve this?

Thanks in advance.

-JP

Hi,

you can place mouse over one of axes of the plotter and than rotate its wheel - this will result into zooming only on axis's direction. Also you can create a new class deriving from ViewportRestriction which will allow zooming only for one axis.

Mikhail.
